Articles.Content:
I've just tried a fresh install of stock v1.0.4. I got Kronal Vessel Viewer via the CKAN (results are the same if I download directly from GitHub). Th image shows a single capsule in the VAB with the KVV window open. Not only does the live pre-view not work but the resulting screenshot looks just like the preview.

![fk4WIhe.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fk4WIhe.jpg)

Has anyone seen this? KVV used to work for me, but it hasn't since v1.0.4. Again, this is a clean install (from Steam) with only KVV installed.
